description: This file defines the ContextUtils class which provides static methods for converting between various context objects used in application gateway, notifications, launch delegate, and app-to-app provider components within the software project. The class facilitates context translation among different modules, ensuring compatibility and data consistency. It also includes a method to check if a given origin string matches a specific gateway callsign.

classes.name: ContextUtils
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods for converting application context objects between different modules.

methods.name: Exchange::IAppGateway::Context ConvertNotificationToAppGatewayContext(const Exchange::IAppNotifications::Context & notificationsContext)
methods.description: Converts an IAppNotifications::Context object into an IAppGateway::Context object.

methods.name: Exchange::ILaunchDelegate::Context ConvertNotificationToLaunchDelegateContext(const Exchange::IAppNotifications::Context & notificationsContext)
methods.description: Converts an IAppNotifications::Context object into an ILaunchDelegate::Context object.

methods.name: Exchange::IAppNotifications::Context ConvertAppGatewayToNotificationContext(const Exchange::IAppGateway::Context & appGatewayContext,const string & origin)
methods.description: Converts an IAppGateway::Context object into an IAppNotifications::Context object, adding the specified origin.

methods.name: Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context ConvertAppGatewayToProviderContext(const Exchange::IAppGateway::Context & appGatewayContext,const string & origin)
methods.description: Converts an IAppGateway::Context object into an IApp2AppProvider::Context object, adding the specified origin.

methods.name: Exchange::IAppGateway::Context ConvertProviderToAppGatewayContext(const Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context & context)
methods.description: Converts an IApp2AppProvider::Context object into an IAppGateway::Context object.

methods.name: Exchange::ILaunchDelegate::Context ConvertProviderToLaunchDelegateContext(const Exchange::IApp2AppProvider::Context & context)
methods.description: Converts an IApp2AppProvider::Context object into an ILaunchDelegate::Context object.

methods.name: Exchange::ILaunchDelegate::Context ConvertGatewayToLaunchDelegateContext(const Exchange::IAppGateway::Context & context)
methods.description: Converts an IAppGateway::Context object into an ILaunchDelegate::Context object.

methods.name: bool IsOriginGateway(const string & origin)
methods.description: Checks if the provided origin string matches the APP_GATEWAY_CALLSIGN.
